$listeners.desc: All native events are being propagated (you don't need the '.native' modifier)

name.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

value.desc: Date of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

landscape.desc: Display the component in landscape mode

mask.desc: Mask (formatting string) used for parsing and formatting value

days.desc: List of full day names (DDDD), starting with Sunday

daysShort.desc: List of short day names (DDD), starting with Sunday

months.desc: List of full month names (MMMM), starting with January

monthsShort.desc: List of short month names (MMM), starting with January

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

square.desc: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

bordered.desc: Applies a default border to the component

title.desc: When specified, it overrides the default header title; Makes sense when not in 'minimal' mode

subtitle.desc: When specified, it overrides the default header subtitle; Makes sense when not in 'minimal' mode

emit-immediately.desc: Emit model when user browses month and year too

default-year-month.desc: The default year and month to display (in YYYY/MM format) when model is unfilled (undefined or null)

default-view.desc: The view which will be displayed by default

years-in-month-view.desc: Show the years selector in months view

events.desc: A list of events to highlight on the calendar; If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a Boolean (matches or not); If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

event-color.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette); If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a String (color for the received date); If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

options.desc: Optionally configure the days that are selectable; If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a Boolean (is date acceptable or not); If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

first-day-of-week.desc: Sets the day of the week that is considered the first day (0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday, ...); This day will show in the left-most column of the calendar

today-btn.desc: Display a button that selects the current day

default.desc: This is where additional buttons can go

input.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model

reason.desc: Reason of the user interaction (what was picked)

details.desc: Object of properties on the new model

offsetCalendar.desc: Increment or decrement calendar view's month or year
